name: toothbrush
info: The toothbrush is an oral hygiene instrument used to clean the teeth, gums, and tongue.

name: typewritter
info: A typewriter is a mechanical or electromechanical machine for writing characters similar to those produced by printer's movable type.

name: telephone
info: A telephone, or phone, is a telecommunications device that permits two or more users to conduct a conversation when they are too far apart to be heard directly.

name: kerosene lamp
info: A kerosene lamp (also known as a paraffin lamp in some countries) is a type of lighting device that uses kerosene (paraffin) as a fuel.

name: dental floss
info: Dental floss is a cord of thin filaments used to remove food and dental plaque from between teeth in areas a toothbrush is unable to reach.

name: post-it
info: A Post-it Note (or sticky note) is a small piece of paper with a re-adherable strip of glue on its back, made for temporarily attaching notes to documents and other surfaces.

name: the eiffel tower
info: The Eiffel Tower is a wrought iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France.

name: razor
info: A razor is a bladed tool primarily used in the removal of unwanted body hair through the act of shaving.
